Saznajte na koji način ova ekipa pretvara nerješivo u rješivo!

programme.title: 911: Teksas
programme.desc: Glumica Gina Torres ulazi u drugu sezonu "911" kao Kapetanica Tommy Vega. Život se mijenja zbog Covida-19 i Tommy će biti suočena s raznim poteškoćama dok se glavni grad Teksasa mora nositi s krizom kakvu nikad prije nisu doživjeli.

programme.title: Crna lista
programme.desc: Nakon zapanjujućeg otkrića da Raymond nije onaj za kojeg se predstavlja, Elizabeth rastrgana je između veze koju je razvila s čovjekom koji tvrdi da je njezin otac i njezine želje da dođe do dna godinama čuvanih laži i tajna.

programme.title: Stotina
programme.desc: U prvome dijelu posljednje epizode pete sezone, Octavia svoj narod vodi u rat.

programme.title: Podzemlje se budi
programme.desc: Kate Beckinsale, zvijezda prva dva filma, vraća se glavnoj ulozi vampirice-ratnice Selene koja bježi iz zatočeništva i vraća se u svijet koji je otkrio postojanje vampira i Likana, nakon čega je uslijedio pravi apokaliptični rat u kojem će ljudi pokušati uništiti obje besmrtne vrste... Film Underworld: Buđenje prvi je u ovom filmskom serijalu snimljen u najmodernijoj 3D tehnologiji, a uz Kate Beckinsale glume i Michael Ealy, Stephen Rea i Kris Holden-Ried.

programme.title: Zločinci u odijelima
programme.desc: S Petrom u zatvoru koji se sučeljava s optužbama za ubojstvo i dokazima koji svi upućuju na njega zbog prijevremene smrti senatora Pratta, Neal mora sklopiti ugovor s vragom kako bi pomogao Petru.

programme.title: Nevolje u raju
programme.desc: Niti u raju niste pošteđeni stresa.Prodavač glazbene igre Guitar Hero, Dave (Vince Vaughn), domaćica Roni (Malin Akerman) te njihovo dvoje djece klasičan su primjer obitelji srednje američke klase, koja većinu vremena provodi skladno i uređujući dom. Jon (Jon Favreau) i Lucy (Kristin Davis) zajedno su još od srednjoškolskih dana, imaju pametnu, ali pomalo naivnu kći Lacey i upravo se suočavaju s bračnom krizom. Jason (Jason Bateman) i Cynthia (Kristen Bell), pak, neurotičan su par i nikako da dobiju bebu. Posljednji dvojac čine Shane (Faizon Love), koji se nedavno rastao, te njegova mlađa djevojka Trudy (Kali Hawk). Prijatelji odlaze na idiličan tropski otok, neki da bi riješili svoje probleme, drugi da bi uživali, no svi u želji za promjenom.

programme.title: Noć i dan
programme.desc: Mladu ženu zamijene s osramoćenim špijunom koji pokušava sprati ljagu sa svojeg imena.

programme.title: Loch Ness
programme.desc: Dr. Jonathan Dempsey je američki znanstvenik koji je karijeru posvetio suvremenih legendi i pseudoznanstvenih fenomena kao što su Bigfoot ili Yeti. To mu, međutim, nije donijelo kredibilitet kod kolega. Njegov šef, Dr. Menser, šalje ga u Škotsku kako bi uz pomoć modernih metoda konačno dokaza da čudovište iz Loch Nessa ne postoji. No, Jonathan uskoro dolazi do zapanjujućeg otkrića.

programme.title: Iskreni razgovor
programme.desc: Žena napušta svoj život u malom gradu i odlazi u Chicago gde postaje poznati radijski voditelj.

programme.title: Crveni planet
programme.desc: Astronauti traže rješenje za spašavanje umiruće Zemlje istraživanjem na Marsku, ali njihova misija krene užasno po zlu.

programme.title: Roditelji
programme.desc: Gil Buckman pomalo je neurotičan stručnjak za prodaju koji neuspješno pokušava balansirati između karijere i obiteljskog života u predgrađu Saint Louisa, jer ne želi biti kao svoj otac -radoholičar koji nema vremena za svoju djecu. Njegove roditeljske sposobnosti nalaze se na pravom iskušenju kada sazna da je njegova žena Karen trudna po četvrti put. Najstariji sin Kevin mora krenuti na terapije kod psihologa, a kako i ostalo dvoje djece imaju manje probleme, Gil počinje kriviti sebe.

programme.title: Dobrodošli kući
programme.desc: Priča o Stewartu Payloru (Luke Perry), slavnom piscu koji se bori protiv nedostatka inspiracije te se odluči preseliti u svoj nekadašnji dom u New Yorku u nadi da će mu povratak korijenima pomoći pri osmišljavanju iduće hit-priče. Po povratku ustanovi da je jedna majka sa svojom djecom, u nedostatku drugih mogućnosti, provalila u njegov stan te ga pretvorila u svoj dom... Dok se raspleće emocionalna priča o tome kako je ova obitelj završila u njegovu stanu, Stewart je potaknut da im pomogne te otkriva da je njegova sljedeća najbolja priča ona iz srca.

programme.title: Zločinci u odijelima
programme.desc: Peter dodjeljuje Nealu novog stručnjaka za istraživanje internetskog crnog tržišta, ali Nealova odanost bit će testirana kada otkrije da bi trag mogao dovesti do Mozzieja.

programme.title: Završni rez
programme.desc: Zoë čip je implantat koji bilježi svaki tren vašeg života. Kad umrete, montažer od snimljenog materijala napravi film (Rememory) koji se prikazuje na pogrebu. Rezervirani samo za bogate, čipovi Zoë mijenjaju način ljudske komunikacije. Ali postoje i oni koji se protive takvoj tehnologiji i vjeruju da uspomene trebaju polako pasti u zaborav. Alan Hackman (Robin Williams) je najbolji montažer u struci i vrlo je tražen zbog neuobičajene sposobnosti da i najkorumpiranije klijente predstavi kao svece. Međutim, taj dar da sagledava živote lišen emocija učinio ga je hladnim čovjekom koji ne može osobno iskusiti život. Vjeruje da je "odrješitelj grijeha" i da će kroz oprost umrlima na neki način moći oprostiti sam sebi. Dok radi na montaži filma za bivšeg visoko pozicioniranog službenika Zoë Techa, Alan otkriva sliku uspomene iz djetinjstva koja ga je proganjala čitavog života. To otkriće nagnat će ga na intenzivnu potragu za istinom i iskupljenjem.

programme.title: Anđeo pravde
programme.desc: Nemojte je podcijeniti i ne zovite je Mala!U skoroj budućnosti Amerika se bori s devastirajućim posljedicama Drugoga građanskog rata te se cijela država nalazi u stanju kaosa. Nekadašnji američki Kongres danas je postala ustanova koja vlada gotovo fašističkim metodama, a jedino mjesto otpora jedini je slobodni grad. Steel Harbor ujedno je i rodni grad Barb Wire (Pamela Anderson), vlasnice noćnoga kluba koja je ujedno i najbolji i najpouzdaniji lovac na glave u državi. Kako se nikome ne bi zamjerila i kako bi preživjela, Barb nikada ne zauzima strane niti izražava vlastitu naklonost. Sve dok je za uslugu ne zamoli bivši dečko...

programme.title: Samo je jedan Jimmy Grimble
programme.desc: Stidljivi mančesterski školarac uspijeva skupiti hrabrost da nogometnu momčad svoje škole povede do finala kupa.

programme.title: Dečki mog života
programme.desc: Snovi Drew Barrymore o tome da postane spisateljica nikad se nisu ostvarili zbog neplanirane trudnoće. No, dok podiže sina, smogne hrabrosti da se iznova posveti svojim snovima.

programme.title: Riječ po riječ
programme.desc: Žena i majka tone sve dublje dok njezin suprug ignorira bračne probleme i posvećuje se kćerinim nastojanjima da postane nacionalna prvakinja u sricanju.

programme.title: Mala princeza
programme.desc: Djevojčica čiji je otac nestao, i pretpostavlja se da je mrtav, završi kao sluškinja u internatu.

programme.title: Mala crna knjižica
programme.desc: Stacy je upravo dobila posao kao producent lokalnog talk showa. Uz uspješan poslovni život, njezin dečko Derek je "onaj pravi". Samo, muči je što on nikad ne razgovara o svojim bivšim vezama. U razgovoru sa svojom kolegicom, odluči prokopati po njegovim stvarima kako bi saznala više informacija o bivšim djevojkama...

programme.title: Oblačno s ćuftama
programme.sub-title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: Temeljen na omiljenoj slikovnici Judi i Rona Barretta, ovaj računalno animirani film priča priču o gradu koji se zove Chewandswallow, gdje nebo nudi sve obroke bez obzira je li riječ o kiši od juhe, snijegu od pire krumpira ili o hrenovkama koje pušu pet kilometara na sat. Nažalost, i vrijeme se, baš poput kiselog mlijeka, pokvari...

programme.title: Što muči Gilberta Grapea
programme.desc: Gilbert nastoji brinuti o svom duševno zaostalom bratu Arnieju i izdržava ostatak obitelji, no nakon što se zaljubi u Becky, koja s bakom putuje po SAD-u i jedan tjedan ostaje u gradu, shvaća da život nudi uzbudljive i nove mogućnosti.

programme.title: Mandela: Dug put do slobode
programme.desc: Kronika životnog puta Nelsona Mandele, od djetinjstva na selu do inauguracije kao prvog demokratski izabranog predsjednika Južnoafričke Republike.

programme.title: Čokolada
programme.desc: Vianne Rocher žena je koja se nakon ispunjenih poslovnih snova i putovanja želi smjestiti u malu francusku provinciju, zajedno sa svojom šestogodišnjom kćeri. Tamo otvara slastičarnicu u kojoj nudi čokoladne slastice napravljene po receptima starih američkih civilizacija što uznemiruje gradonačelnika. Vianne uskoro ostaje zaintrigirana naočitim irskim Ciganinom...

programme.title: Psi od slame
programme.desc: Scenarist David Sumner sa suprugom se iz Los Angelesa preseli u njezin rodni grad na Jugu. Dok ondje raste napetost među njima, sve veći sukob s mještanima pretvara se u opasnost za oboje.

programme.title: Bilježnica mladog liječnika
programme.sub-title: A Young Doctor's Notebook and Other Stories
programme.desc: Jon Hamm i Daniel Radclifffe zvijezde su ove ironične i duhovite drame o praksi mladog liječnika koji odmah poslije fakulteta počinje raditi u zabačenom i zaostalom ruskom selu.

programme.title: Bilježnica mladog liječnika
programme.sub-title: A Young Doctor's Notebook and Other Stories
programme.desc: Jon Hamm i Daniel Radclifffe zvijezde su ove ironične i duhovite drame o praksi mladog liječnika koji odmah poslije fakulteta počinje raditi u zabačenom i zaostalom ruskom selu.

programme.title: Detektiv Murdoch
programme.desc: Kraj 19. stoljeća. William Murdoch služi se tada radikalnim forenzičkim tehnikama, poput otisaka prstiju i raznih tragova, da bi riješio neka od najstrašnijih ubojstava u gradu.

programme.title: Detektiv Murdoch
programme.desc: Kada prijateljica s kojom je u djetinjstvu boravio u kampu u prirodi upozori Murdocha na neposrednu opasnost, zajedno odlaze u park Algonquin kako bi istražili ubojstvo od prije 30 godina.

programme.title: Poldark
programme.desc: Otac mu je mrtav, imanje mu je u rasulu, a njegova voljena Elizabeth zaručena je za njegova rođaka Francisa. Godine 1783. Ross Poldark, vraća se kući svojim rudnicima kositra u Cornwallu i shvaća da se mnogo toga promijenilo.

programme.title: Pustolovine Frankie Drake
programme.desc: Smještena u Toronto 1920-ih godina, ovo je priča o jedinim privatnim detektivkama u gradu koje se hvataju u koštac sa slučajevima koje policija ne želi istraživati. U tom vremenu promjena i nade, njihov im je spol najveća prednost.

programme.title: Istrage gospođice Fisher
programme.desc: Naša detektivka obilazi sporedne ulice i jazz klubove Melbournea s kraja 1920-ih godina, boreći se protiv nepravde pištoljem s drškom od sedefa i britkim umom.

programme.title: Detektiv Murdoch
programme.desc: Kraj 19. stoljeća. William Murdoch služi se tada radikalnim forenzičkim tehnikama, poput otisaka prstiju i raznih tragova, da bi riješio neka od najstrašnijih ubojstava u gradu.

programme.title: Detektiv Murdoch
programme.desc: Bježeći od agenata britanske tajne službe koji ga optužuju za ubojstvo, Murdoch se nađe u Bristolu u Engleskoj, ali ne zna tko je, kako je tu dospio i zašto bi ga itko želio ubiti.

programme.title: Detektiv Murdoch
programme.desc: Kraj 19. stoljeća. William Murdoch služi se tada radikalnim forenzičkim tehnikama, poput otisaka prstiju i raznih tragova, da bi riješio neka od najstrašnijih ubojstava u gradu.

programme.title: Detektiv Murdoch
programme.desc: Muškarac koji je ubijen u masonskoj loži vodio je dvostruki život, što natjera Murdocha da zamoli dr. Ogden da u tajnosti pokuša doznati što više o žrtvinim tajnama te na kraju otkriva ubojicu.

programme.title: Detektiv Murdoch

programme.title: Suđenje Christine Keeler
programme.desc: Smještena u vrijeme političkih promjena 1960-ih godina, ova serija otkriva nam pozadinu novinskih naslovnica o prijelomnom britanskom skandalu, ispričanom kroz živote njegovih glavnih protagonista.

programme.title: Poldark
programme.desc: Otac mu je mrtav, imanje mu je u rasulu, a njegova voljena Elizabeth zaručena je za njegova rođaka Francisa. Godine 1783. Ross Poldark, vraća se kući svojim rudnicima kositra u Cornwallu i shvaća da se mnogo toga promijenilo.

programme.title: Kraljeva miljenica
programme.desc: Ovo je priča o spletkama, strasti i ljubavi koja je promijenila povijest. Portugal, 18. stoljeće: mlada, energična i lijepa Paula mora se zarediti, no život u samostanu nimalo je ne privlači...

programme.title: Detektiv Murdoch

programme.desc: Kraj 19. stoljeća. William Murdoch služi se tada radikalnim forenzičkim tehnikama, poput otisaka prstiju i raznih tragova, da bi riješio neka od najstrašnijih ubojstava u gradu.

programme.title: Detektiv Murdoch
programme.desc: Kraj 19. stoljeća. William Murdoch služi se tada radikalnim forenzičkim tehnikama, poput otisaka prstiju i raznih tragova, da bi riješio neka od najstrašnijih ubojstava u gradu.

programme.title: Detektiv Murdoch
programme.desc: Bježeći od agenata britanske tajne službe koji ga optužuju za ubojstvo, Murdoch se nađe u Bristolu u Engleskoj, ali ne zna tko je, kako je tu dospio i zašto bi ga itko želio ubiti.

programme.title: Detektiv Murdoch
programme.desc: Kraj 19. stoljeća. William Murdoch služi se tada radikalnim forenzičkim tehnikama, poput otisaka prstiju i raznih tragova, da bi riješio neka od najstrašnijih ubojstava u gradu.

programme.title: Detektiv Murdoch
programme.desc: Muškarac koji je ubijen u masonskoj loži vodio je dvostruki život, što natjera Murdocha da zamoli dr. Ogden da u tajnosti pokuša doznati što više o žrtvinim tajnama te na kraju otkriva ubojicu.

programme.title: Detektiv Murdoch
programme.desc: Kraj 19. stoljeća. William Murdoch služi se tada radikalnim forenzičkim tehnikama, poput otisaka prstiju i raznih tragova, da bi riješio neka od najstrašnijih ubojstava u gradu.

programme.title: Poldark
programme.desc: Otac mu je mrtav, imanje mu je u rasulu, a njegova voljena Elizabeth zaručena je za njegova rođaka Francisa. Godine 1783. Ross Poldark, vraća se kući svojim rudnicima kositra u Cornwallu i shvaća da se mnogo toga promijenilo.

programme.title: Pustolovine Frankie Drake
programme.desc: Smještena u Toronto 1920-ih godina, ovo je priča o jedinim privatnim detektivkama u gradu koje se hvataju u koštac sa slučajevima koje policija ne želi istraživati. U tom vremenu promjena i nade, njihov im je spol najveća prednost.

programme.title: Istrage gospođice Fisher
programme.desc: Naša detektivka obilazi sporedne ulice i jazz klubove Melbournea s kraja 1920-ih godina, boreći se protiv nepravde pištoljem s drškom od sedefa i britkim umom.

programme.title: Detektiv Murdoch
programme.desc: Kraj 19. stoljeća. William Murdoch služi se tada radikalnim forenzičkim tehnikama, poput otisaka prstiju i raznih tragova, da bi riješio neka od najstrašnijih ubojstava u gradu.

programme.title: Detektiv Murdoch
programme.desc: Kraj 19. stoljeća. William Murdoch služi se tada radikalnim forenzičkim tehnikama, poput otisaka prstiju i raznih tragova, da bi riješio neka od najstrašnijih ubojstava u gradu.

programme.title: Suđenje Christine Keeler
programme.desc: Smještena u vrijeme političkih promjena 1960-ih godina, ova serija otkriva nam pozadinu novinskih naslovnica o prijelomnom britanskom skandalu, ispričanom kroz živote njegovih glavnih protagonista.

programme.title: Poldark
programme.desc: Otac mu je mrtav, imanje mu je u rasulu, a njegova voljena Elizabeth zaručena je za njegova rođaka Francisa. Godine 1783. Ross Poldark, vraća se kući svojim rudnicima kositra u Cornwallu i shvaća da se mnogo toga promijenilo.

programme.title: Kraljeva miljenica
programme.desc: Ovo je priča o spletkama, strasti i ljubavi koja je promijenila povijest. Portugal, 18. stoljeće: mlada, energična i lijepa Paula mora se zarediti, no život u samostanu nimalo je ne privlači...

programme.title: Detektiv Murdoch
programme.desc: Kraj 19. stoljeća. William Murdoch služi se tada radikalnim forenzičkim tehnikama, poput otisaka prstiju i raznih tragova, da bi riješio neka od najstrašnijih ubojstava u gradu.

programme.title: Spartak
programme.desc: Tiberije je ogorčen i slomljen. Nakon što je morao pretući Sabina do smrti, istresa se na preživjelim kukavicama. Otac Marko Kras šalje svoje ljubavnice da utješe njegovog nasljednika vinom i nježnostima, ali podlac bira silovanje robinje kao naknadu. Senatora Metela ignoriraju kad postavlja pitanje zašto vojska nije krenula na Sinuesu, ali uskoro će mu biti jasno. Spartak iskušava Kriksovu odanost do točke loma, tako što ga ne vodi u napade na Krasove zalihe hrane. Obznanjuje da će na Herakleonovim brodovima ploviti na Siciliju i oslobađa posljednje Rimljane. Dok Kriks doznaje da je to diverzija za napad na Krasov tabor, Cezar potpiruje razdor do krajnjih granica, prije nego što otvori vrata svojim vojnicima. Spartak uviđa da je napad s mora sabotiran, budući da su se sicilski pirati prodali Krasu.

programme.title: Tucker i Dale protiv zla
programme.desc: Dva miroljubiva seljaka iz zapadne Virginie, Tucker i Dale, odlučili su se uputiti u svoju planinsku kolibu za odmor, dobro se napiti piva, uživati u ribolovu i sve u svemu se dobro zabaviti. Međutim, nalete na skupinu šminkerskih fakultetlija koji po njihovom neuglađenom izgledu pretpostave da su oni ubojice koji divljaju motornom pilom. Odmor Tuckera i Dalea dobiva krvav i urnebesan zaokret kojim stvari kreću po zlu. Broj slučajnih žrtava raste paralelno sa strahom i metežom. Učenici im se žele osvetiti, a njih dvojica vjeruju da su oni pripadnici nekog pakta samoubojica. Unaprijed stvoreni zaključci i nesporazumi gomilaju se zajedno sa stravom i razdraganošću.

programme.title: Spartak
programme.desc: Tiberije je ogorčen i slomljen. Nakon što je morao pretući Sabina do smrti, istresa se na preživjelim kukavicama. programme.title: Čuda oceana
programme.desc: Stanovnici oceana neprekidno se bore za hranu, no i za to da sami ne postanu hrana, za partnera, za prosljeđivanje svojih gena sljedećoj generaciji… Za preživljavanje...

programme.title: Nevjerojatni dr. Pol
programme.desc: U klinici se samo nižu neobični pa i bizarni slučajevi. Kraj 19.000 klijenata, samo je pitanje vremena kad će veterinari naići na nešto potpuno novo. Dr. Pol mora neinvazivno ukloniti rak penisa kod konja te izliječiti prolaps penisa kod patka.

programme.title: Nevjerojatni dr. Pol
programme.desc: Dr. Pola u klinici i kod kuće čeka još jedan naporan tjedan. Veterinari imaju pune ruke posla i klijenti uzimaju stvari u svoje ruke. Brenda mora smisliti plan terapije za hiperaktivnog štenca Casha koji je slomio nogu.

programme.title: Nevjerojatni dr. Pol
programme.desc: Pred klinikom još je jedan naporan tjedan. Hoće li dr. Pol i ostali veterinari uspjeti spasiti sve bolesne životinje? Na farmi McConnell hitno moraju pomoći kravi da oteli blizance. Svaka je minuta važna!

programme.title: Ptičji planet
programme.desc: Ptice su jedine životinje koje žive na svih sedam kontinenata. Neke ptice ubijaju, neke skaču, neke plešu, krešte i oduševljavaju...

programme.title: Čuda oceana
programme.desc: U otoke Tihog oceana ubrajaju se koraljni grebeni, vulkanski otoci i komadići izgubljenog kontinenta. Otkrijte nevjerojatne priče o prilagodbi i preživljavanju ovih otoka života...

programme.title: Čuda oceana
programme.desc: Stanovnici oceana neprekidno se bore za hranu, no i za to da sami ne postanu hrana, za partnera, za prosljeđivanje svojih gena sljedećoj generaciji… Za preživljavanje...

programme.title: Veterinar iz Yukona: Na sjeveru
programme.desc: Stvari će postati komplicirane kad dr. Michelle Oakley pokuša izaći na kraj s dva mošusna goveda. Zatim Michellein suprug Shane pokušava izaći na kraj sa stadom krava koje bi mogle biti noseće...

programme.title: Iskušenja divljine
programme.desc: U golemoj regiji Serengeti u Africi milijuni divljih životinja uzimaju rijetku stanku, kako bi majke rodile svoje mlade, u masovnom događaju.

programme.title: Iskušenja divljine
programme.desc: Crveni rak s Božičnog otoka kopneni je rak koji još ima jake veze s oceanom, jedinim mjestom gdje mogu roditi svoje mlade.

programme.title: Negostoljubivi Planet
programme.desc: Najtoplija staništa planeta, pustinje, postaju još toplije, suše i veće, ali mnoštvo izvanrednih životinja još uvijek preživljava u najtežim uvjetima, uključujući lukave hijene, merkate i paukove koji žive u pijesku...

programme.title: Negostoljubivi Planet
programme.desc: Obilje vode, topline i svjetlosti čini džunglu mjestom s najraznovrsnijim životom na Zemlji. Ali ovo ipak nije raj - od jaguara do gibona, preko kolibrića i orangutana, otkrijte zašto borba životinja za opstanak nikad nije bila teža...

programme.title: Negostoljubivi Planet
programme.desc: "Negostoljubivi Planet" istražuje najnepristupačnije zemaljske okoliše. U šest epizoda istražit ćemo dubine, visine, hladnoću, vrućinu, vlagu i sušu i pokazati nevjerojatne načine na koje su im se životinje prilagodile...

programme.title: Nevjerojatni dr. Pol
programme.desc: Iako je Nizozemac, dom dr. Pola je Michigan. On i njegova obitelj aktivni su članovi zajednice. Za svoj je trud nagrađen priznanjem. No nema vremena za slavlje. Mora kastrirati teliće na farmi i spriječiti epidemiju konjunktivitisa.

programme.title: Negostoljubivi Planet
programme.desc: Najtoplija staništa planeta, pustinje, postaju još toplije, suše i veće, ali mnoštvo izvanrednih životinja još uvijek preživljava u najtežim uvjetima, uključujući lukave hijene, merkate i paukove koji žive u pijesku...

programme.title: Negostoljubivi Planet
programme.desc: Obilje vode, topline i svjetlosti čini džunglu mjestom s najraznovrsnijim životom na Zemlji. Ali ovo ipak nije raj - od jaguara do gibona, preko kolibrića i orangutana, otkrijte zašto borba životinja za opstanak nikad nije bila teža...

programme.title: Negostoljubivi Planet
programme.desc: Travnjaci spadaju najteže okoliše. Životinje ondje trpe smjenjivanje poplava, gladi, smrzavanja i požara. Otkrivamo kakve izazove moraju savladati i kako opstanak u današnjem svijetu nikad nije bio teži...

programme.title: Negostoljubivi Planet
programme.desc: "Negostoljubivi Planet" istražuje najnepristupačnije zemaljske okoliše. U šest epizoda istražit ćemo dubine, visine, hladnoću, vrućinu, vlagu i sušu i pokazati nevjerojatne načine na koje su im se životinje prilagodile...

programme.title: Životinjski klub boraca
programme.desc: Ova epizoda pokazat će vam kako se neke od najubojitijih borbi odvijaju unutar iste vrste, bilo za teritorij, potomke ili preživljavanje...

programme.title: Životinjski klub boraca
programme.desc: Od sivih kitova do afričkih slonova, bitke se odvijaju za zaštitu potomaka i osiguranja nasljeđa...

programme.title: Životinjski klub boraca
programme.desc: Životinje se bore za teritorij, hranu i pravo parenja diljem svijeta. Kad se klanovi geparda, kapucina, lemura ili jaguara bore za teritorij, krzno leti na sve strane...

programme.title: Životinjski klub boraca
programme.desc: Zakleti neprijatelji koriste svoje vještine u borbi za dominaciju, ali ponekad sama snaga ne znači pobjedu...

programme.title: Nevjerojatni dr. Pol
programme.desc: Iako je Nizozemac, dom dr. Pola je Michigan. On i njegova obitelj aktivni su članovi zajednice. Za svoj je trud nagrađen priznanjem. No nema vremena za slavlje. Mora kastrirati teliće na farmi i spriječiti epidemiju konjunktivitisa.

programme.title: Životinjski klub boraca
programme.desc: Na afričkim ravnicama žive strašni grabežljivci, gepardi, lavovi i hijene, ali ni plijen nije nemoćan. Gepardica se suočava s gazelinim teškim oružjem, a tri lava pogriješit će kao nikad u životu napavši nosoroga...

programme.title: Tajne zoološkog vrta
programme.desc: Plamenci dobivaju svoj godišnji pregled, a dva preslatka lamantina stižu u zoološki vrt prije puštanja u divljinu...

programme.title: Dr. T, Texas Vet
programme.desc: Za dr. Lauren Thielen, poznatu i kao dr. T, briga o životinjama više je od puke profesije, to je njezina apsolutna strast. Vratila se u svoju rodnu državu Teksas kako bi otvorila vlastitu veterinarsku stanicu, radeći zajedno s jednom od najvećih bolnica za životinje u državi...

programme.title: Dr. T, Texas Vet
programme.desc: Za dr. Lauren Thielen, poznatu i kao dr. T, briga o životinjama više je od puke profesije, to je njezina apsolutna strast. Vratila se u svoju rodnu državu Teksas kako bi otvorila vlastitu veterinarsku stanicu, radeći zajedno s jednom od najvećih bolnica za životinje u državi...

programme.title: Tajne zoološkog vrta
programme.desc: Plamenci dobivaju svoj godišnji pregled, a dva preslatka lamantina stižu u zoološki vrt prije puštanja u divljinu...

programme.title: Nevjerojatni dr. Pol: Kompilacije
programme.desc: Nema puno toga što dr. Jan Pol nije vidio tijekom svoje duge veterinarske karijere. Ovaj nizozemski veterinar pomaže životinjama otkako je diplomirao na Sveučilištu Utrecht 1970. godine. U ovoj dokumentarnoj seriji osvrćemo na nezaboravne trenutke iz njegove reality serije "Nevjerojatni dr. Pol.

programme.title: Hitna služba za egzotične životinje doktorice K.
programme.desc: Kornjači Washington nešto blokira probavni trakt, ima kamenac u mjehuru, a možda joj treba izvaditi jajnike. Hitno dovode prerijskog psa inficiranog penisa. Dr. K. pregledom zeca Waltera otkriva infekciju prsta...

programme.title: Životinjski klub boraca
programme.desc: Na afričkim ravnicama žive strašni grabežljivci, gepardi, lavovi i hijene, ali ni plijen nije nemoćan. Gepardica se suočava s gazelinim teškim oružjem, a tri lava pogriješit će kao nikad u životu napavši nosoroga...

programme.desc: Od sivih kitova do afričkih slonova, bitke se odvijaju za zaštitu potomaka i osiguranja nasljeđa...

programme.title: Životinjski klub boraca
programme.desc: Životinje se bore za teritorij, hranu i pravo parenja diljem svijeta. Kad se klanovi geparda, kapucina, lemura ili jaguara bore za teritorij, krzno leti na sve strane...

programme.title: Životinjski klub boraca
programme.desc: Zakleti neprijatelji koriste svoje vještine u borbi za dominaciju, ali ponekad sama snaga ne znači pobjedu...

programme.title: Nevjerojatni dr. Pol
programme.desc: Iako je Nizozemac, dom dr. Pola je Michigan. On i njegova obitelj aktivni su članovi zajednice. Za svoj je trud nagrađen priznanjem. No nema vremena za slavlje. Mora kastrirati teliće na farmi i spriječiti epidemiju konjunktivitisa.

programme.title: Životinjski klub boraca
programme.desc: Na afričkim ravnicama žive strašni grabežljivci, gepardi, lavovi i hijene, ali ni plijen nije nemoćan. Gepardica se suočava s gazelinim teškim oružjem, a tri lava pogriješit će kao nikad u životu napavši nosoroga...

programme.title: Tajne zoološkog vrta
programme.desc: Plamenci dobivaju svoj godišnji pregled, a dva preslatka lamantina stižu u zoološki vrt prije puštanja u divljinu...

programme.title: Dr. T, Texas Vet
programme.desc: Za dr. Lauren Thielen, poznatu i kao dr. T, briga o životinjama više je od puke profesije, to je njezina apsolutna strast. Vratila se u svoju rodnu državu Teksas kako bi otvorila vlastitu veterinarsku stanicu, radeći zajedno s jednom od najvećih bolnica za životinje u državi...

programme.title: Dr. T, Texas Vet
programme.desc: Za dr. Lauren Thielen, poznatu i kao dr. T, briga o životinjama više je od puke profesije, to je njezina apsolutna strast. Vratila se u svoju rodnu državu Teksas kako bi otvorila vlastitu veterinarsku stanicu, radeći zajedno s jednom od najvećih bolnica za životinje u državi...

programme.title: Tajne zoološkog vrta
programme.desc: Plamenci dobivaju svoj godišnji pregled, a dva preslatka lamantina stižu u zoološki vrt prije puštanja u divljinu...

programme.title: Nevjerojatni dr. Pol: Kompilacije
programme.desc: Nema puno toga što dr. Jan Pol nije vidio tijekom svoje duge veterinarske karijere. Ovaj nizozemski veterinar pomaže životinjama otkako je diplomirao na Sveučilištu Utrecht 1970. godine. U ovoj dokumentarnoj seriji osvrćemo na nezaboravne trenutke iz njegove reality serije "Nevjerojatni dr. Pol.

programme.title: Hitna služba za egzotične životinje doktorice K.
programme.desc: Kornjači Washington nešto blokira probavni trakt, ima kamenac u mjehuru, a možda joj treba izvaditi jajnike. Hitno dovode prerijskog psa inficiranog penisa. Dr. K. pregledom zeca Waltera otkriva infekciju prsta...

programme.title: Životinjski klub boraca
programme.desc: Na afričkim ravnicama žive strašni grabežljivci, gepardi, lavovi i hijene, ali ni plijen nije nemoćan. Gepardica se suočava s gazelinim teškim oružjem, a tri lava pogriješit će kao nikad u životu napavši nosoroga...

programme.title: Tajne zoološkog vrta
programme.desc: Plamenci dobivaju svoj godišnji pregled, a dva preslatka lamantina stižu u zoološki vrt prije puštanja u divljinu...

programme.title: Megapolis: Otkrivanje drevnog svijeta
programme.desc: "Megapolis: Otkrivanje drevnog svijeta" serija je koja otkriva zanimljivosti legendarnih arheoloških nalazišta. Riječ je o Ateni, Rimu, Aleksandriji i Tikalu, a svojom izvanrednošću predstavljaju drevni svijet. Otkrijte što se sve zbivalo u tim svjetski poznatim drevnim gradovima!...

programme.title: Henrik VIII. - muškarac, monarh, čudovište
programme.desc: Trodijelna serija predstavlja život kralja Henrika VIII. Prikazuje njegov život od mladosti do kasnijih godina. Nakon što je postao nasljednik prijestolja nakon neočekivane smrti njegovog starijeg brata, mladi princ Henry također je izgubio majku, što je još jedna osobna tragedija ovoga vladara. Pratimo mladog kralja na njegovom putu, uključujući zloglasnu bitku za vlast s Katoličkom crkvom i potragu za engleskom reformacijom, koja mu omogućava ponovno sklapanje braka...

programme.title: Megapolis: Otkrivanje drevnog svijeta
programme.desc: "Megapolis: Otkrivanje drevnog svijeta" serija je koja otkriva zanimljivosti legendarnih arheoloških nalazišta. programme.title: Uživo s policijskim patrolama
programme.desc: Realističan dokumentarac o policijskim službenicima u akciji...

programme.title: Hladnokrvni ubojice
programme.desc: Voljeni par nestaje malo prije tradicionalne božićne zabave, a obitelj strahuje od najgorega. Policija taj dugogodišnji misterij pokušava riješiti na sve načine, od prerušavanja u pripadnike mafije do izvlačenja informacija iz prestrašenih svjedoka.

programme.title: Prvih 48 sati predstavlja: Ključne minute
programme.desc: U četiri skraćene priče predstavljamo četiri detektivke za ubojstva iz emisije "Prvih 48 sati". Među pričama su i krvavi sukob u Memphisu te slučaj samohrane majke iz Cincinnatija rastrgane između posla i kuće.

programme.title: Uživo s policijskim patrolama
programme.desc: Realističan dokumentarac o policijskim službenicima u akciji...

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: The second you shut the door in the morning, your pets start wreaking havoc around the house, one catastrophe at a time! Mike is a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, who savours the peace and tranquillity of his home. Every morning, he wakes up with one thing on his mind - how to impress the neighbour's elegant dog Iris, who likes to sunbathe on her patio. Sadly, his plans never work out as a bunch of interfering troublemakers have a surprising knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen calamities! Ultimately, Mike will always manage to get rid of the raccoons, put the turtles back in their tank and save Fluffy the Kitten… AGAIN! But after his owners return, a totally exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to gain Iris's affections...

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs are so obsessed with catching Lamput that even in their dreams, the chase goes on. It's really not a restful sleep, when you keep waking up sweating from horrid visions that, let's face it, just remind you what a nightmare your day job is. The Docs make the brave decision to see a therapist about these terrible dreams. In the waiting room is the last orange blob they wanted to see; apparently a life of hot pursuit is taking its toll on Lamput, too. The shrink will have to resort to some very unconventional treatments...

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: You never can tell when inspiration's gonna strike. Specs and Skinny are having a nice evening at the theatre, enjoying a magic show, when the perfect Lamput-catching strategy falls right in their lap! "The perfect strategy" is a magic necklace of invisibility. "Falling in their lap" is stealing it from the magician's dressing room. Specs and Skinny waste no time tracking Lamput down and ruining a perfectly good picnic. As usual the Docs snatch defeat from the jaws of victory when Lamput gets a hold of the necklace. Now the orange blob can morph AND go invisible. No fair!

programme.title: Taffy
programme.desc: Welcome to Muchmore Manor, home of uber-rich senior Mrs Muchmore and her beloved dog with a red bow, Bentley. They want for nothing - unlike the down-on-his-luck trash-eating raccoon, who spends his days jealously gazing at the constant food deliveries to the Manor. Eventually it becomes too much for the little scavenger, and he gets an idea - he'll disguise himself as an adorable kitty cat and infiltrate the manor, where it'll be a never-ending buffet! Believe it or not - thanks to a snazzy bow, and an adorable little 'meow', his insane plan works. Mrs. Muchmore names him "Taffy" and showers the "cat" with the kind of cuddling that her dog could only dream of. Bentley the dog is no dummy, though - he knows that Taffy's a raccoon, and will stop at nothing to take down the intruder by exposing him as the dirty rodent he is! They talk, they laugh, they shout and throw barbs at each other, but all Mrs. Muchmore and other humans can hear are innocent mewing and barking...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve in Canada, lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. In the eyes of the animals for 60 miles around, it's El Dorado. Because he is at the top of the food chain, the bear GRIZZY feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. When he comes through the door (after picking the lock with a skillful swat of his claws), he makes himself at home, for he considers this his "real" home. Naturally, no other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege." That is no other animal except one: a tribe that belongs to the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists - THE LEMMINGS - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. The possibilities for having fun there are so plentiful that his house is like an entertainment park for them!...

Because he is at the top of the food chain, the bear GRIZZY feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. When he comes through the door (after picking the lock with a skillful swat of his claws), he makes himself at home, for he considers this his "real" home. Naturally, no other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege." That is no other animal except one: a tribe that belongs to the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists - THE LEMMINGS - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. The possibilities for having fun there are so plentiful that his house is like an entertainment park for them!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve in Canada, lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. In the eyes of the animals for 60 miles around, it's El Dorado. Because he is at the top of the food chain, the bear GRIZZY feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. When he comes through the door (after picking the lock with a skillful swat of his claws), he makes himself at home, for he considers this his "real" home. Naturally, no other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege." That is no other animal except one: a tribe that belongs to the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists - THE LEMMINGS - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. The possibilities for having fun there are so plentiful that his house is like an entertainment park for them!

programme.title: Mr Magoo
programme.desc: Mr. Magoo is a dynamic senior citizen who takes full advantage of being retired. He is overwhelmingly curious, has a sharp mind and is…almost as blind as a bat! Tied in with unshakable self-confidence, his "ocular deficiency" means that Magoo is never really where he thinks he is, he is never really doing what he thinks he is doing (with varying nuances we shall see later). Accompanied by his faithful Mr. Cat, who is a dog he thinks is a cat, Magoo is never, ever bored. He goes to the museum, has romantic rendezvous, goes golfing, go-carting… or relaxes in his garden during his ritual Sunday barbecue with Weasel, his delightful neighbor. "Delightful"… in appearance only! Because lo!, Weasel is very good at hiding his game. Underneath his poker-face of ideal camaraderie and neighbourly bonhomie hides the henchman of the worst super-villain the world has ever known: Fizz, his pet hamster, graced with an intelligence as rare and refined as it is evil to the bone...

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: The second you shut the door in the morning, your pets start wreaking havoc around the house, one catastrophe at a time! Mike is a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, who savours the peace and tranquillity of his home. Every morning, he wakes up with one thing on his mind - how to impress the neighbour's elegant dog Iris, who likes to sunbathe on her patio. Sadly, his plans never work out as a bunch of interfering troublemakers have a surprising knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen calamities! Ultimately, Mike will always manage to get rid of the raccoons, put the turtles back in their tank and save Fluffy the Kitten… AGAIN! But after his owners return, a totally exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to gain Iris's affections...

programme.title: Taffy
programme.desc: Welcome to Muchmore Manor, home of uber-rich senior Mrs Muchmore and her beloved dog with a red bow, Bentley. They want for nothing - unlike the down-on-his-luck trash-eating raccoon, who spends his days jealously gazing at the constant food deliveries to the Manor. Eventually it becomes too much for the little scavenger, and he gets an idea - he'll disguise himself as an adorable kitty cat and infiltrate the manor, where it'll be a never-ending buffet! Believe it or not - thanks to a snazzy bow, and an adorable little 'meow', his insane plan works. Mrs. Muchmore names him "Taffy" and showers the "cat" with the kind of cuddling that her dog could only dream of. Bentley the dog is no dummy, though - he knows that Taffy's a raccoon, and will stop at nothing to take down the intruder by exposing him as the dirty rodent he is! They talk, they laugh, they shout and throw barbs at each other, but all Mrs. Muchmore and other humans can hear are innocent mewing and barking...

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: With high school over and one last summer to live it up, Shaggy, Scooby, Velma, Daphne and Fred decide to travel during what could be their last summer break together. The gang hits the road in the Mystery Machine. chasing fun and adventure. However, havoc-wreaking monsters have a way of finding Scooby and the gang, preventing them from completing their journey. Will they be able to solve this summer's mysteries and phenomena?

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: With high school over and one last summer to live it up, Shaggy, Scooby, Velma, Daphne and Fred decide to travel during what could be their last summer break together. The gang hits the road in the Mystery Machine. chasing fun and adventure. However, havoc-wreaking monsters have a way of finding Scooby and the gang, preventing them from completing their journey. Will they be able to solve this summer's mysteries and phenomena?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back in THE TOM AND JERRY SHOW, a fresh take on the classic series. Preserving the look, characters and sensibility of the original, the all-new series shines a brightly colored, high-definition lens on the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time. Comprised of two 11-minute shorts, each episode will feature Tom the cat and Jerry the mouse plotting against each other in their traditional suburban setting, as well as additional storylines where their rivalry is set in more fantastic worlds, like a medieval castle or even a mad scientist's lab. With a setup as elementary as a cat chasing a mouse and the mouse's retaliations, the possibilities are endless!

programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back in THE TOM AND JERRY SHOW, a fresh take on the classic series. Preserving the look, characters and sensibility of the original, the all-new series shines a brightly colored, high-definition lens on the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time. Comprised of two 11-minute shorts, each episode will feature Tom the cat and Jerry the mouse plotting against each other in their traditional suburban setting, as well as additional storylines where their rivalry is set in more fantastic worlds, like a medieval castle or even a mad scientist's lab. With a setup as elementary as a cat chasing a mouse and the mouse's retaliations, the possibilities are endless!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van. But by the time he gets to the front of the queue the ice-cream man has gone to lunch. Bean takes it upon himself to climb through in an open window and into the back of the van from where he starts to help himself. Unfortunately he soon attracts a crowd and is forced to serve a long queue of kids until all the ice cream runs out. When the ice-cream man comes back from lunch and drives away he is unaware that Bean is still hiding in the back of his van en route to the ice cream factory...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is Back! Mr Bean is back for a second series of his animated adventures. Starring in 52 brand new episodes Mr Bean creates his own electricity wins a cruise inadvertently becomes a teacher makes his own horror movie is hypnotised wins a wrestling match and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. This series follows Mr Bean his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: In the middle of peaceful nature, a community is teeming with activity: They're the Mushables! Mush-Mush and the Mushables follows the forest adventures of Mush-Mush, his best friends Lilit and Chep and the rest of the Mushable community, as they explore, grow up together and discover just how fun and wild life can be. Welcome to Mushworld! As pocket-sized Guardians of the Forest, each Mushable has a special gift. While Mush-Mush can communicate with nature, Lilit shines bright like a light and Chep has an impressive memory. As they get to know their talents and their limits, the Mushables find there is still a lot to discover about growing up… Mush-Mush & the Mushables is a fun journey of self-discovery, exciting outdoor adventure and mush mush more! Their world is full of characters who have unique physical and personality quirks, and who can't help but be themselves! Whatever the situation, wherever they are, they are still them...

programme.title: Pat the Dog
programme.desc: Despite his small size and playful attitude, Pat has always been a hero! Pat is the 'little dog next door', the friend you dream of having! With his big snout that sounds like a horn, he doesn't look like much, but he is devoted and courageous. To give himself extra strength and courage, he won't hesitate to don a cape, or cobble together some gear to leap into the heat of the action and take up any challenge. He overcomes the insurmountable with his improvised plans and his canine genius! His missions are sometimes perilous, often surprising and above all, constantly funny! When you see him shoot into the sky from a clothes line, or strap himself to a remote-controlled car to rescue someone…You might think he's a little 'wacko'! Or a little reckless…Or a little of both! Typical hero behaviour. With Lola, the only child in the family, who loves to play with Pat, and Hoodie, the adorable cat and newcomer to the family who is always getting in trouble, Pat has his hands full!

programme.title: Kingdom Force
programme.desc: Kingdom Force is a 24/7 search and rescue unit dedicated to helping their fellow animals. The team of five, diverse animal heroes and their all-terrain vehicles serve and protect the citizens of the Five Kingdoms, while their massive, mobile HQ constantly patrols in search of action and adventure. When the peril gets too hot to handle, the team shouts their rallying cry of "Kingdom Force: Unite!" and the vehicles fluidly transform into a massive, state-of-the-art rescue robot that combines all the strengths of the five animal heroes of Kingdom Force. Through team-work, cooperation, and embracing diversity, there is no challenge the Kingdom Force team can't handle! Led by the fearless wolf, Luka, this team has a carnivorous appetite for danger and thrills and there's no operation they can't pull off with the help of their giant rescue robot, Alpha-Mech...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve in Canada, lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. In the eyes of the animals for 60 miles around, it's El Dorado. Because he is at the top of the food chain, the bear GRIZZY feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. When he comes through the door (after picking the lock with a skillful swat of his claws), he makes himself at home, for he considers this his "real" home. Naturally, no other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege." That is no other animal except one: a tribe that belongs to the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists - THE LEMMINGS - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. The possibilities for having fun there are so plentiful that his house is like an entertainment park for them!...

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: The second you shut the door in the morning, your pets start wreaking havoc around the house, one catastrophe at a time! Mike is a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, who savours the peace and tranquillity of his home. Every morning, he wakes up with one thing on his mind - how to impress the neighbour's elegant dog Iris, who likes to sunbathe on her patio. Sadly, his plans never work out as a bunch of interfering troublemakers have a surprising knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen calamities! Ultimately, Mike will always manage to get rid of the raccoons, put the turtles back in their tank and save Fluffy the Kitten… AGAIN! But after his owners return, a totally exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to gain Iris's affections...

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes follows the Looney Tunes gang as they grow up, learn about friendship, how to deal with bullies and leaving the nursery. Baby Bugs Bunny leads his friends and wants to be a star, Baby Lola daydreams a lot, Baby Daffy always wants his own way, Baby Sylvester gets easily scared, Baby Taz loves the good things in life and finally, Baby Tweety is kind and caring. Living together with kind old Granny, the gang has lots of fun causing lots of trouble!

programme.title: Ben 10
programme.desc: While on a seemingly endless summer vacation with his Grandpa Max and Cousin Gwen, Ben Tennyson discovers an alien watch: the Omnitrix. This device gives Ben the ability to transform into any one of ten spectacular and powerful aliens! Ben, Gwen and Max travel the country in their motor home affectionately known as the Rust Bucket seeing the sights, stumbling into adventures and beating down would-be villains while generally having a blast!

programme.title: Power Players
programme.desc: Axel, a 9-year-old boy who can transform into a living action figure, gains a wild new perspective on the world as he wrangles a team of quirky smart-toys on the biggest small adventures a kid could ever imagine. Life as a toy superhero has its pluses and minuses. On the upside, Axel has massive mecha suit power, a cool energy sword, an impenetrable shield and other abilities he himself hasn't even discovered yet. Axel is much stronger, more skilled and faster than when he's his human self. On the downside, toy Axel is only seven-inches tall, and the world around him is no longer adapted to his size: the garden turns into a huge mysterious jungle, a sandbox becomes a desert...! The real world gets a whole lot more complicated and dangerous when Axel sees it from a toy point of view!...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Good news: one and only Mr Bean is back, only this time like a cartoon character. Mr Bean lives in a small apartment in London. His landlady Mrs Wicket does not seem to like him at all and is always grumpy and unhappy. Even her cat Scrapper behaves just like her and causes troubles. Teddy is Mr Bean's best friend, despite the fact that it is a toy Mr Bean treats him as animate creature and does not separate from him. Irma Gobb is Mr. Bean's girlfriend, who is suffering from his poor attitude. Mr Bean is extremely good at finding himself in awkward situations and trying to get out of them, that is why we like him so much...

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: It's back to basics as Specs attempts to catch Lamput with a net. Not being much good at anything at all physical, Specs ends up whacking himself on his own noggin. The blow shakes loose what little ability Specs had to function as an adult. He's transformed into a wailing infant who requires 24 hour care from his devoted... parents? Skinny and Lamput have to learn on the job. Taking care of a baby is hard. Especially if it's a giant annoying one...

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: With high school over and one last summer to live it up, Shaggy, Scooby, Velma, Daphne and Fred decide to travel during what could be their last summer break together. The gang hits the road in the Mystery Machine. chasing fun and adventure. However, havoc-wreaking monsters have a way of finding Scooby and the gang, preventing them from completing their journey. Will they be able to solve this summer's mysteries and phenomena?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back in THE TOM AND JERRY SHOW, a fresh take on the classic series. Preserving the look, characters and sensibility of the original, the all-new series shines a brightly colored, high-definition lens on the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time. Comprised of two 11-minute shorts, each episode will feature Tom the cat and Jerry the mouse plotting against each other in their traditional suburban setting, as well as additional storylines where their rivalry is set in more fantastic worlds, like a medieval castle or even a mad scientist's lab. With a setup as elementary as a cat chasing a mouse and the mouse's retaliations, the possibilities are endless!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: In the middle of peaceful nature, a community is teeming with activity: They're the Mushables! Mush-Mush and the Mushables follows the forest adventures of Mush-Mush, his best friends Lilit and Chep and the rest of the Mushable community, as they explore, grow up together and discover just how fun and wild life can be. Welcome to Mushworld! As pocket-sized Guardians of the Forest, each Mushable has a special gift. While Mush-Mush can communicate with nature, Lilit shines bright like a light and Chep has an impressive memory. As they get to know their talents and their limits, the Mushables find there is still a lot to discover about growing up… Mush-Mush & the Mushables is a fun journey of self-discovery, exciting outdoor adventure and mush mush more! Their world is full of characters who have unique physical and personality quirks, and who can't help but be themselves! Whatever the situation, wherever they are, they are still them...

programme.title: Pat the Dog
programme.desc: Despite his small size and playful attitude, Pat has always been a hero! Pat is the 'little dog next door', the friend you dream of having! With his big snout that sounds like a horn, he doesn't look like much, but he is devoted and courageous. To give himself extra strength and courage, he won't hesitate to don a cape, or cobble together some gear to leap into the heat of the action and take up any challenge. He overcomes the insurmountable with his improvised plans and his canine genius! His missions are sometimes perilous, often surprising and above all, constantly funny! When you see him shoot into the sky from a clothes line, or strap himself to a remote-controlled car to rescue someone…You might think he's a little 'wacko'! Or a little reckless…Or a little of both! Typical hero behaviour. With Lola, the only child in the family, who loves to play with Pat, and Hoodie, the adorable cat and newcomer to the family who is always getting in trouble, Pat has his hands full!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve in Canada, lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. In the eyes of the animals for 60 miles around, it's El Dorado. Because he is at the top of the food chain, the bear GRIZZY feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. When he comes through the door (after picking the lock with a skillful swat of his claws), he makes himself at home, for he considers this his "real" home. Naturally, no other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege." That is no other animal except one: a tribe that belongs to the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists - THE LEMMINGS - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. The possibilities for having fun there are so plentiful that his house is like an entertainment park for them!...

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes follows the Looney Tunes gang as they grow up, learn about friendship, how to deal with bullies and leaving the nursery. Baby Bugs Bunny leads his friends and wants to be a star, Baby Lola daydreams a lot, Baby Daffy always wants his own way, Baby Sylvester gets easily scared, Baby Taz loves the good things in life and finally, Baby Tweety is kind and caring. Living together with kind old Granny, the gang has lots of fun causing lots of trouble!

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes follows the Looney Tunes gang as they grow up, learn about friendship, how to deal with bullies and leaving the nursery. Baby Bugs Bunny leads his friends and wants to be a star, Baby Lola daydreams a lot, Baby Daffy always wants his own way, Baby Sylvester gets easily scared, Baby Taz loves the good things in life and finally, Baby Tweety is kind and caring. Living together with kind old Granny, the gang has lots of fun causing lots of trouble!

programme.title: Power Players
programme.desc: Axel, a 9-year-old boy who can transform into a living action figure, gains a wild new perspective on the world as he wrangles a team of quirky smart-toys on the biggest small adventures a kid could ever imagine. Life as a toy superhero has its pluses and minuses. On the upside, Axel has massive mecha suit power, a cool energy sword, an impenetrable shield and other abilities he himself hasn't even discovered yet. Axel is much stronger, more skilled and faster than when he's his human self. On the downside, toy Axel is only seven-inches tall, and the world around him is no longer adapted to his size: the garden turns into a huge mysterious jungle, a sandbox becomes a desert...! The real world gets a whole lot more complicated and dangerous when Axel sees it from a toy point of view!...

programme.title: Power Players

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Good news: one and only Mr Bean is back, only this time like a cartoon character. Mr Bean lives in a small apartment in London. His landlady Mrs Wicket does not seem to like him at all and is always grumpy and unhappy. Even her cat Scrapper behaves just like her and causes troubles. Teddy is Mr Bean's best friend, despite the fact that it is a toy Mr Bean treats him as animate creature and does not separate from him. Irma Gobb is Mr. Bean's girlfriend, who is suffering from his poor attitude. Mr Bean is extremely good at finding himself in awkward situations and trying to get out of them, that is why we like him so much...

programme.title: New Looney Tunes
programme.desc: New Looney Tunes, known as Wabbit: A Looney Tunes Production follows new adventures of smart and hilarious Bugs Bunny. He is always busy with new bright ideas and plans and this time some new friends are by his side: Squeaks the Squirrel and baby Bigfoot. Bugs Bunny is going through serious battles with evil he has not met before: skilled ninjas, barbarians and even death in a specific form. We are going to meet old characters as well- Yosemite Sam and Wile E. Coyote. This time Yosemite becomes a bookkeeper, but he does not enjoy it as it is too boring and too diligent for his personality. These two are still trying to make things lively for Bunny, so Bunny has to watch out...

programme.title: Mr Magoo
programme.desc: Mr. Magoo is a dynamic senior citizen who takes full advantage of being retired. He is overwhelmingly curious, has a sharp mind and is…almost as blind as a bat! Tied in with unshakable self-confidence, his "ocular deficiency" means that Magoo is never really where he thinks he is, he is never really doing what he thinks he is doing (with varying nuances we shall see later). Accompanied by his faithful Mr. Cat, who is a dog he thinks is a cat, Magoo is never, ever bored. He goes to the museum, has romantic rendezvous, goes golfing, go-carting… or relaxes in his garden during his ritual Sunday barbecue with Weasel, his delightful neighbor. "Delightful"… in appearance only! Because lo!, Weasel is very good at hiding his game. Underneath his poker-face of ideal camaraderie and neighbourly bonhomie hides the henchman of the worst super-villain the world has ever known: Fizz, his pet hamster, graced with an intelligence as rare and refined as it is evil to the bone...

programme.title: Mr Magoo
programme.desc: Mr. Magoo is a dynamic senior citizen who takes full advantage of being retired. He is overwhelmingly curious, has a sharp mind and is…almost as blind as a bat! Tied in with unshakable self-confidence, his "ocular deficiency" means that Magoo is never really where he thinks he is, he is never really doing what he thinks he is doing (with varying nuances we shall see later). Accompanied by his faithful Mr. Cat, who is a dog he thinks is a cat, Magoo is never, ever bored. He goes to the museum, has romantic rendezvous, goes golfing, go-carting… or relaxes in his garden during his ritual Sunday barbecue with Weasel, his delightful neighbor. "Delightful"… in appearance only! Because lo!, Weasel is very good at hiding his game. Underneath his poker-face of ideal camaraderie and neighbourly bonhomie hides the henchman of the worst super-villain the world has ever known: Fizz, his pet hamster, graced with an intelligence as rare and refined as it is evil to the bone...

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: The second you shut the door in the morning, your pets start wreaking havoc around the house, one catastrophe at a time! Mike is a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, who savours the peace and tranquillity of his home. Every morning, he wakes up with one thing on his mind - how to impress the neighbour's elegant dog Iris, who likes to sunbathe on her patio. Sadly, his plans never work out as a bunch of interfering troublemakers have a surprising knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen calamities! Ultimately, Mike will always manage to get rid of the raccoons, put the turtles back in their tank and save Fluffy the Kitten… AGAIN! But after his owners return, a totally exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to gain Iris's affections...

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs are so obsessed with catching Lamput that even in their dreams, the chase goes on. It's really not a restful sleep, when you keep waking up sweating from horrid visions that, let's face it, just remind you what a nightmare your day job is. The Docs make the brave decision to see a therapist about these terrible dreams. In the waiting room is the last orange blob they wanted to see; apparently a life of hot pursuit is taking its toll on Lamput, too. The shrink will have to resort to some very unconventional treatments...

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: You never can tell when inspiration's gonna strike. Specs and Skinny are having a nice evening at the theatre, enjoying a magic show, when the perfect Lamput-catching strategy falls right in their lap! "The perfect strategy" is a magic necklace of invisibility. "Falling in their lap" is stealing it from the magician's dressing room. Specs and Skinny waste no time tracking Lamput down and ruining a perfectly good picnic. As usual the Docs snatch defeat from the jaws of victory when Lamput gets a hold of the necklace. Now the orange blob can morph AND go invisible. No fair!

programme.title: Taffy
programme.desc: Welcome to Muchmore Manor, home of uber-rich senior Mrs Muchmore and her beloved dog with a red bow, Bentley. They want for nothing - unlike the down-on-his-luck trash-eating raccoon, who spends his days jealously gazing at the constant food deliveries to the Manor. Eventually it becomes too much for the little scavenger, and he gets an idea - he'll disguise himself as an adorable kitty cat and infiltrate the manor, where it'll be a never-ending buffet! Believe it or not - thanks to a snazzy bow, and an adorable little 'meow', his insane plan works. Mrs. Muchmore names him "Taffy" and showers the "cat" with the kind of cuddling that her dog could only dream of. Bentley the dog is no dummy, though - he knows that Taffy's a raccoon, and will stop at nothing to take down the intruder by exposing him as the dirty rodent he is! They talk, they laugh, they shout and throw barbs at each other, but all Mrs. Muchmore and other humans can hear are innocent mewing and barking...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve in Canada, lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. In the eyes of the animals for 60 miles around, it's El Dorado. Because he is at the top of the food chain, the bear GRIZZY feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. When he comes through the door (after picking the lock with a skillful swat of his claws), he makes himself at home, for he considers this his "real" home. Naturally, no other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege." That is no other animal except one: a tribe that belongs to the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists - THE LEMMINGS - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. The possibilities for having fun there are so plentiful that his house is like an entertainment park for them!...

programme.title: Mr Magoo
programme.desc: Mr. Magoo is a dynamic senior citizen who takes full advantage of being retired. He is overwhelmingly curious, has a sharp mind and is…almost as blind as a bat! Tied in with unshakable self-confidence, his "ocular deficiency" means that Magoo is never really where he thinks he is, he is never really doing what he thinks he is doing (with varying nuances we shall see later). Accompanied by his faithful Mr. Cat, who is a dog he thinks is a cat, Magoo is never, ever bored. He goes to the museum, has romantic rendezvous, goes golfing, go-carting… or relaxes in his garden during his ritual Sunday barbecue with Weasel, his delightful neighbor. "Delightful"… in appearance only! Because lo!, Weasel is very good at hiding his game. Underneath his poker-face of ideal camaraderie and neighbourly bonhomie hides the henchman of the worst super-villain the world has ever known: Fizz, his pet hamster, graced with an intelligence as rare and refined as it is evil to the bone...

He goes to the museum, has romantic rendezvous, goes golfing, go-carting… or relaxes in his garden during his ritual Sunday barbecue with Weasel, his delightful neighbor. "Delightful"… in appearance only! Because lo!, Weasel is very good at hiding his game. Underneath his poker-face of ideal camaraderie and neighbourly bonhomie hides the henchman of the worst super-villain the world has ever known: Fizz, his pet hamster, graced with an intelligence as rare and refined as it is evil to the bone...

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: The second you shut the door in the morning, your pets start wreaking havoc around the house, one catastrophe at a time! Mike is a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, who savours the peace and tranquillity of his home. Every morning, he wakes up with one thing on his mind - how to impress the neighbour's elegant dog Iris, who likes to sunbathe on her patio. Sadly, his plans never work out as a bunch of interfering troublemakers have a surprising knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen calamities! Ultimately, Mike will always manage to get rid of the raccoons, put the turtles back in their tank and save Fluffy the Kitten… AGAIN! But after his owners return, a totally exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to gain Iris's affections...

programme.title: Taffy
programme.desc: Welcome to Muchmore Manor, home of uber-rich senior Mrs Muchmore and her beloved dog with a red bow, Bentley. They want for nothing - unlike the down-on-his-luck trash-eating raccoon, who spends his days jealously gazing at the constant food deliveries to the Manor. Eventually it becomes too much for the little scavenger, and he gets an idea - he'll disguise himself as an adorable kitty cat and infiltrate the manor, where it'll be a never-ending buffet! Believe it or not - thanks to a snazzy bow, and an adorable little 'meow', his insane plan works. Mrs. Muchmore names him "Taffy" and showers the "cat" with the kind of cuddling that her dog could only dream of. Bentley the dog is no dummy, though - he knows that Taffy's a raccoon, and will stop at nothing to take down the intruder by exposing him as the dirty rodent he is! They talk, they laugh, they shout and throw barbs at each other, but all Mrs. Muchmore and other humans can hear are innocent mewing and barking...

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: With high school over and one last summer to live it up, Shaggy, Scooby, Velma, Daphne and Fred decide to travel during what could be their last summer break together. The gang hits the road in the Mystery Machine. chasing fun and adventure. However, havoc-wreaking monsters have a way of finding Scooby and the gang, preventing them from completing their journey. Will they be able to solve this summer's mysteries and phenomena?

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: With high school over and one last summer to live it up, Shaggy, Scooby, Velma, Daphne and Fred decide to travel during what could be their last summer break together. The gang hits the road in the Mystery Machine. chasing fun and adventure. However, havoc-wreaking monsters have a way of finding Scooby and the gang, preventing them from completing their journey. Will they be able to solve this summer's mysteries and phenomena?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back in THE TOM AND JERRY SHOW, a fresh take on the classic series. Preserving the look, characters and sensibility of the original, the all-new series shines a brightly colored, high-definition lens on the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time. Comprised of two 11-minute shorts, each episode will feature Tom the cat and Jerry the mouse plotting against each other in their traditional suburban setting, as well as additional storylines where their rivalry is set in more fantastic worlds, like a medieval castle or even a mad scientist's lab. With a setup as elementary as a cat chasing a mouse and the mouse's retaliations, the possibilities are endless!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van. But by the time he gets to the front of the queue the ice-cream man has gone to lunch. Bean takes it upon himself to climb through in an open window and into the back of the van from where he starts to help himself. Unfortunately he soon attracts a crowd and is forced to serve a long queue of kids until all the ice cream runs out. When the ice-cream man comes back from lunch and drives away he is unaware that Bean is still hiding in the back of his van en route to the ice cream factory...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is Back! Mr Bean is back for a second series of his animated adventures. Starring in 52 brand new episodes Mr Bean creates his own electricity wins a cruise inadvertently becomes a teacher makes his own horror movie is hypnotised wins a wrestling match and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. This series follows Mr Bean his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: In the middle of peaceful nature, a community is teeming with activity: They're the Mushables! Mush-Mush and the Mushables follows the forest adventures of Mush-Mush, his best friends Lilit and Chep and the rest of the Mushable community, as they explore, grow up together and discover just how fun and wild life can be. Welcome to Mushworld! As pocket-sized Guardians of the Forest, each Mushable has a special gift. While Mush-Mush can communicate with nature, Lilit shines bright like a light and Chep has an impressive memory. As they get to know their talents and their limits, the Mushables find there is still a lot to discover about growing up… Mush-Mush & the Mushables is a fun journey of self-discovery, exciting outdoor adventure and mush mush more! Their world is full of characters who have unique physical and personality quirks, and who can't help but be themselves! Whatever the situation, wherever they are, they are still them...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: In the middle of peaceful nature, a community is teeming with activity: They're the Mushables! Mush-Mush and the Mushables follows the forest adventures of Mush-Mush, his best friends Lilit and Chep and the rest of the Mushable community, as they explore, grow up together and discover just how fun and wild life can be. Welcome to Mushworld! As pocket-sized Guardians of the Forest, each Mushable has a special gift. While Mush-Mush can communicate with nature, Lilit shines bright like a light and Chep has an impressive memory. As they get to know their talents and their limits, the Mushables find there is still a lot to discover about growing up… Mush-Mush & the Mushables is a fun journey of self-discovery, exciting outdoor adventure and mush mush more! Their world is full of characters who have unique physical and personality quirks, and who can't help but be themselves! Whatever the situation, wherever they are, they are still them.

programme.title: Pat the Dog
programme.desc: Despite his small size and playful attitude, Pat has always been a hero! Pat is the 'little dog next door', the friend you dream of having! With his big snout that sounds like a horn, he doesn't look like much, but he is devoted and courageous. To give himself extra strength and courage, he won't hesitate to don a cape, or cobble together some gear to leap into the heat of the action and take up any challenge. He overcomes the insurmountable with his improvised plans and his canine genius! His missions are sometimes perilous, often surprising and above all, constantly funny! When you see him shoot into the sky from a clothes line, or strap himself to a remote-controlled car to rescue someone…You might think he's a little 'wacko'! Or a little reckless…Or a little of both! Typical hero behaviour. With Lola, the only child in the family, who loves to play with Pat, and Hoodie, the adorable cat and newcomer to the family who is always getting in trouble, Pat has his hands full!

programme.title: Kingdom Force
programme.desc: Kingdom Force is a 24/7 search and rescue unit dedicated to helping their fellow animals. The team of five, diverse animal heroes and their all-terrain vehicles serve and protect the citizens of the Five Kingdoms, while their massive, mobile HQ constantly patrols in search of action and adventure. When the peril gets too hot to handle, the team shouts their rallying cry of "Kingdom Force: Unite!" and the vehicles fluidly transform into a massive, state-of-the-art rescue robot that combines all the strengths of the five animal heroes of Kingdom Force. Through team-work, cooperation, and embracing diversity, there is no challenge the Kingdom Force team can't handle! Led by the fearless wolf, Luka, this team has a carnivorous appetite for danger and thrills and there's no operation they can't pull off with the help of their giant rescue robot, Alpha-Mech...

programme.title: Kingdom Force

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve in Canada, lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. In the eyes of the animals for 60 miles around, it's El Dorado. Because he is at the top of the food chain, the bear GRIZZY feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. When he comes through the door (after picking the lock with a skillful swat of his claws), he makes himself at home, for he considers this his "real" home. Naturally, no other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege." That is no other animal except one: a tribe that belongs to the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists - THE LEMMINGS - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. The possibilities for having fun there are so plentiful that his house is like an entertainment park for them!...

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: The second you shut the door in the morning, your pets start wreaking havoc around the house, one catastrophe at a time! Mike is a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, who savours the peace and tranquillity of his home. Every morning, he wakes up with one thing on his mind - how to impress the neighbour's elegant dog Iris, who likes to sunbathe on her patio. Sadly, his plans never work out as a bunch of interfering troublemakers have a surprising knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen calamities! Ultimately, Mike will always manage to get rid of the raccoons, put the turtles back in their tank and save Fluffy the Kitten… AGAIN! But after his owners return, a totally exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to gain Iris's affections...

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes follows the Looney Tunes gang as they grow up, learn about friendship, how to deal with bullies and leaving the nursery. Baby Bugs Bunny leads his friends and wants to be a star, Baby Lola daydreams a lot, Baby Daffy always wants his own way, Baby Sylvester gets easily scared, Baby Taz loves the good things in life and finally, Baby Tweety is kind and caring. Living together with kind old Granny, the gang has lots of fun causing lots of trouble!

Living together with kind old Granny, the gang has lots of fun causing lots of trouble!

programme.title: Ben 10
programme.desc: While on a seemingly endless summer vacation with his Grandpa Max and Cousin Gwen, Ben Tennyson discovers an alien watch: the Omnitrix. This device gives Ben the ability to transform into any one of ten spectacular and powerful aliens! Ben, Gwen and Max travel the country in their motor home affectionately known as the Rust Bucket seeing the sights, stumbling into adventures and beating down would-be villains while generally having a blast!

programme.title: Power Players
programme.desc: Axel, a 9-year-old boy who can transform into a living action figure, gains a wild new perspective on the world as he wrangles a team of quirky smart-toys on the biggest small adventures a kid could ever imagine. Life as a toy superhero has its pluses and minuses. On the upside, Axel has massive mecha suit power, a cool energy sword, an impenetrable shield and other abilities he himself hasn't even discovered yet. Axel is much stronger, more skilled and faster than when he's his human self. On the downside, toy Axel is only seven-inches tall, and the world around him is no longer adapted to his size: the garden turns into a huge mysterious jungle, a sandbox becomes a desert...! The real world gets a whole lot more complicated and dangerous when Axel sees it from a toy point of view!...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Good news: one and only Mr Bean is back, only this time like a cartoon character. Mr Bean lives in a small apartment in London. His landlady Mrs Wicket does not seem to like him at all and is always grumpy and unhappy. Even her cat Scrapper behaves just like her and causes troubles. Teddy is Mr Bean's best friend, despite the fact that it is a toy Mr Bean treats him as animate creature and does not separate from him. Irma Gobb is Mr. Bean's girlfriend, who is suffering from his poor attitude. Mr Bean is extremely good at finding himself in awkward situations and trying to get out of them, that is why we like him so much...
